backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing access control, user profiles, inquiries, and invoice creation with special handling for anonymous LOC invoices.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script updating LOC sample invoices by clearing dischargeDate when matching specific criteria.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing routing, pages, components, and backend hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light and dark mode OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint containing root div and module script loading the main React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router, QueryClient, and layout with header and footer across all routes.
frontend/src/components/ClaimDetailsDial: Dialog component displaying claim details with invoice metadata and optional cancel-invoice action.
frontend/src/components/CreateLocInvoice: Dialog component allowing users to pick invoice and transaction dates and submit them; manages date state, formatting, and submit availability.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying current year, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai with dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, dropdown menus for Billing and Account, and logic to open/close menus based on user interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocInvoiceReceivab: Hooks for fetching LOC receivables and deleting single or multiple LOC invoices with cache updates and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for inquiries and invoices, including fetch, create, update, and delete operations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark healthcare-themed color palettes, plus base typography and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Billing.tsx: UI page showing billing features with cards for invoices, payments, claims, reports, and a security notice.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with a hero section, billing-focused marketing content, and a link to the Billing page.
frontend/src/pages/HospiceBilling.tsx: Simple page header and description for hospice billing management.
frontend/src/pages/Intake.tsx: Empty placeholder file for Intake page.
frontend/src/pages/IntakeRedirect.tsx: Redirects users to the Billing page on mount using router navigation.
Page for displaying, selecting, viewing, and deleting LOC invoices with backend integration and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ManifestLocBilling.ts: Displays a single LOC inquiry, allows selecting it, and supports creating an invoice through a dialog with backend calls.
frontend/src/pages/ManifestRbBilling.tsx: Frontend-only R&B billing manifest page with record selection and stubbed invoice creation.
frontend/src/pages/RbInvoiceReceivable.t: Renders the R&B Receivables page with display, selection, and bulk‑delete behavior for pending non‑LOC invoices.
frontend/src/pages/Ub04Form.tsx: Displays a UB04 red‑form template page with simple static invoice overlays and a back link to LOC receivables.
frontend/src/utils/authErrorMessages.ts: Normalizes authentication and authorization error messages and provides a helper to detect auth‑related errors.
frontend/src/utils/deleteResultsMessagin: Formats bulk delete results into user‑friendly success or error messages and extracts concise failure reasons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current billing‑only direction, required navigation and receivables changes, and known issues in the workflow.
